name: Fluette Consulting
tagline: Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Consulting
body: ### What I Do I do **AI**, **Machine Learning**, and **Data Mining** consulting. I answer the question *What can I learn from my data?*. I have worked on: * Recommendation systems * Computer vision and image analysis * Data visualization and analytics ### Who I Am I act as project lead and primary data analyst: coding, visualizing, planning, and delivering. You can find out more about me on my [personal page](http://fluette.me). My academic advisor Paul E. Anderson assists in administrative tasks involving coordinating timelines and project goals with clients and acts his academic research experience makes him an invaluable resource. ### Clients * [BoomTown](http://boomtownroi.com/) ### Contact Me You can contact me [via email](mailto:fluetteka@g.cofc.edu?Subject=[fluette.me] Hello).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
